mapper.sql: mac_id_creator AS macIdCreator ,mac_id_accessor AS macIdAccessor ,capitalsourceid AS id ,type ,state ,accountnumber AS accountNumber ,bankcode AS bankCode ,comment ,validtil AS validTil ,validfrom AS validFrom ,att_group_use AS attGroupUse ,import_allowed AS importAllowed
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT UPPER(SUBSTR(comment,1,1)) letters FROM vw_capitalsources WHERE maf_id = #{userId} AND NOW() BETWEEN maf_validfrom AND maf_validtil ORDER BY letters
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vw_capitalsources WHERE maf_id = #{userId} AND NOW() BETWEEN maf_validfrom AND maf_validtil
SELECT FROM vw_capitalsources WHERE maf_id = #{userId} AND NOW() BETWEEN maf_validfrom AND maf_validtil ORDER BY CASE WHEN mac_id_creator = #{userId} THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ,capitalsourceid

SELECT FROM vw_capitalsources WHERE UPPER(comment) LIKE CONCAT(UPPER(#{initial}),'%') AND maf_id = #{userId} AND NOW() BETWEEN maf_validfrom AND maf_validtil ORDER BY CASE WHEN mac_id_creator = #{userId} THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ,capitalsourceid
